Sure it is a fun game, but it is infested with cheaters everywhere. The best way to enjoy the game is third party competitive or community servers with alternative game modes such as Course, Minigames, or Jailbreak.

If you want to enjoy competitive expect a lot of cheaters, griefers, people who refuse to communicate and those who create new profiles to shit on less experienced players because their main account has too high of a rank.
